label: Natural Health and Wellness
description: Products and services related to natural health and wellness, including herbal remedies, acupuncture, chiropractic care, and detoxification.
intents: Find natural remedies for health issues

subcategories.label: Herbal Remedies
subcategories.description: Natural remedies made from herbs and plants.

subcategories.label: Acupuncture
subcategories.description: Traditional Chinese medicine practice that involves inserting needles into specific points on the body.

subcategories.label: Chiropractic Care
subcategories.description: Healthcare profession that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of musculoskeletal disorders.

subcategories.label: Detoxification
subcategories.description: Process of removing toxins from the body.

subcategories.label: Homeopathy
subcategories.description: Alternative medicine practice that uses highly diluted substances to stimulate the body's natural healing processes.
